package.name: lsm_localization
package.description: A full localization algorithm that can be used together with the ROS Navigation package to localize the robot. It is based on incremental laser scan matcher, using Andrea Censi's Canonical Scan Matcher (CSM) implementation and derived from the code available in the ROS scan_tools package. See: http://censi.mit.edu/software/csm/ and https://github.com/CCNYRoboticsLab/scan_tools
package.author: Ivan Dryanovski
